title: How to Make Chocolate Surprise Cupcakes

steps.headline: Spray 24 muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray or line them with paper cupcake liners.
Add the 2 cups sugar, cocoa, salt and baking soda to a large mixing bowl.
Add the vegetable oil, water, vinegar and vanilla to the batter.
Ladle the mixture into the prepared muffin cups.
steps.description: Be sure to make each cup 2/3 full.

steps.headline: Beat together the cream cheese, egg, remaining sugar and remaining salt until light and fluffy.
Add the chocolate chips and stir into the cream cheese mixture.
Use a teaspoon to drop a heaping teaspoon of the cream cheese mixture into each cupcake.
Bake until the cupcakes test done, about 25 minutes.

text: Cake Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Spray 24 muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray or line them with paper cupcake liners.  Add the 2 cups sugar, cocoa, salt and baking soda to a large mixing bowl. Beat well. Add the vegetable oil, water, vinegar and vanilla to the batter. Mix until blended. Ladle the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Be sure to make each cup 2/3 full. Filling Beat together the cream cheese, egg, remaining sugar and remaining salt until light and fluffy.  Add the chocolate chips and stir into the cream cheese mixture.  Use a teaspoon to drop a heaping teaspoon of the cream cheese mixture into each cupcake.  Bake until the cupcakes test done, about 25 minutes.
